snippet: A Russian circus trainer fed a cocktail of warm water and vodka to two elephants stranded in the blistering Siberian cold on Thursday and credited it with saving their lives.
abstract: Russian circus trainer feeds cocktail of warm water and vodka to two elephants stranded in the blistering Siberian cold and credits it with saving their lives.
lead_paragraph: A Russian circus trainer fed a cocktail of warm water and vodka to two elephants stranded in the blistering Siberian cold on Thursday and credited it with saving their lives.
